Text: RE RESUMEpst Hey Joe I wanted to follow up with yaI talked with Tracy Dillee in our HR our trading managers Unforntunately they said they didnt have a good fit right now but definitely wanted to keep your resume on file They may have other opportunities over time so I would recommend you checking back or talking with Tracy She can be reached at just ask for her name Good luck and stay in touch Tom Original Message From Parks Joe SMTPJoe NRONcom Sent Wednesday February AM To TOM NTERGYKOCHCOM Subject RESUME Thanks for fowarding my resume Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Mccall Tom EKT Joe JHPdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you File JHPdoc

OffsetHey Geoff In talking with JAron I found that they have the offsetting positon on ZH PEPL I would like to sell enron day ZH PEPL to Enron and JAron would like to buy day ZH from Enron Let me know how we can proceed to clean this offset up Thanks Tom McCall
